\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	& X & Y & {\text{``pure''}} \\
	{\,} & A & B & {\in \mathbf{mod}_R} & {\,}
	\arrow["f", from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["\alpha"', from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "s", dashed, from=1-3, to=2-2]
	\arrow["\beta", from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["g"', from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["\circlearrowleft"{description}, draw=none, from=1-2, to=0]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
